mapper.select: SELECT id, name, sex, tel, TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR, birthday, NOW()) AS age, date, status FROM tb_appointment WHERE order_id = #{orderId} ORDER BY id DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_appointment SET uuid = #{uuid}, order_id = #{orderId}, date = #{date}, name = #{name}, sex = #{sex}, pid = #{pid}, birthday = #{birthday}, tel = #{tel}, mailing_address = #{mailingAddress}, company = #{company}, status = 1
